items.title: Live Updates: Fire Halts Operations at London’s Heathrow Airport, Throwing Global Travel Into Disarray
items.description: A giant blaze near one of the world’s busiest airports knocked out power, Britain’s energy minister said, and the cause was under investigation. Tens ...

items.title: Sudan’s Army Retakes the Presidential Palace in Khartoum
items.description: Two years into a civil war, troops recaptured the palace in Khartoum, routing a paramilitary foe. Civilians have been trapped in the middle in a city ...

items.title: Germany, ‘Orphaned’ by U.S., Shakes Off the Shock and Stirs to Action
items.description: No country in Europe is as much a product of enlightened postwar American diplomacy. Now adrift, it has begun to reckon with a new world.

items.title: What Happens When a Hub Like Heathrow Shuts Down
items.description: Lots of people need to secure hotel rooms and new travel plans.

items.title: What We Know About the Closure of Heathrow Airport
items.description: A fire at a substation in London cut off power to one of the world’s busiest airports, causing travel disruptions globally.
